specs.title: should enforce CSRF protection on state-changing requests
should validate CSRF token rotation and expiry
should protect against CSRF double-submit cookie attacks
should prevent stored XSS in user profiles
should validate Content Security Policy headers
should enforce API endpoint rate limiting
should implement progressive rate limiting penalties
should validate and sanitize file upload inputs
should enforce HTTPS in production mode
should perform comprehensive security scan of authentication flows
should validate specific OWASP Top 10 protections
should validate Turkish KVKV data protection compliance
should complete registration with KVKV compliance validation
should reject registration with weak password
should prevent registration without KVKV consent
should handle login with invalid credentials
should enforce account lockout after multiple failed attempts
should require MFA during login for enabled users
should validate PKCE security in OIDC flow
should consume magic link and authenticate
should reject invalid magic link tokens
should complete logout flow with session cleanup
should redirect unlicensed users to license page
should allow licensed users to access features
POST /api/v1/auth/register - should register user with KVKV compliance
POST /api/v1/auth/register - should reject registration without KVKV consent
POST /api/v1/auth/login - should authenticate with valid credentials
POST /api/v1/auth/mfa/setup/verify - should verify and enable MFA
GET /api/v1/me - should return current user profile
DELETE /api/v1/me - should delete user account with KVKV compliance
POST /api/v1/auth/logout - should logout and revoke session
should return proper Turkish error messages
